## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (518d3f6a1c247b59dcde3b2cfe41c4f8ab75e690380da11b8fd153c136177889)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nanovest-portal' @ 5.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
